factual_finding.issue: 3D and 5D hit rates were calculated using total events (n=31) instead of events with non-NULL outcomes
factual_finding.consequence: Artificial decay appeared in horizon comparisons (58% -> 22% -> 16%)
factual_finding.root_cause: CASE WHEN correct_direction_3d THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 treated NULL as 0
factual_finding.reality: Hit rate is stable ~56-58% across all horizons when calculated correctly

correction_applied.denominator_rule: For each horizon H: Denominator = COUNT(events WHERE outcome_H IS NOT NULL)
correction_applied.implementation: Added FILTER (WHERE price_t0_plus_Xd IS NOT NULL) to all hit rate calculations
correction_applied.data_quality_annotations: Added completeness percentages and status flags per horizon
